column3: Let's see if we can reproduce the problem w/ Travis test coverage on master @luke-jr mentions here https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14968#issuecomment-450321053

This is interesting, apparently the first test `p2p_compactblocks` fails, but not, say, creating the cache. This is a different problem than #14968 used to have.
```

 node0 2018-12-28T10:10:15.279730Z Binding RPC on address ::1 port 16704 
 node0 2018-12-28T10:10:15.279807Z libevent: getaddrinfo: addres
